verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>me<s%>, Let us go unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that art <S%H1129>builded<s%> As a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H2266>compact<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>;

Whither <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%>, even the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, For an <S%H5715>ordinance<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, To give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
For there are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, The <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: They shall <S%H7951>prosper<s%> that love <S%H157>thee<s%>.
Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within thy <S%H2426>walls<s%>, And <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within thy <S%H759>palaces<s%>.
For my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and <S%H7453>companions<s%>' <S%H1696>sakes<s%>, I will now say, Peace be within <S%H7965>thee<s%>.
For the sake of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H2896>good<s%>.
